TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICallbackEventHandler

summary.span: 用來表示控制項可以做為伺服器上回呼事件的目標。

span.span: Used to indicate that a control can be the target of a callback event on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作需要接收回呼事件的任何自訂控制項的介面。Implement the interface for any custom control that needs to receive callback events. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[實作用戶端回呼而不回傳](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185)。For more information, see [Implementing Client Callbacks Without Postbacks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dfaaa7d4-e1f2-4322-b2f5-796e0419f185). 實作的控制項範例介面包含， ，和控制項。Examples of controls that implement the interface include the , , and controls. 回撥事件實作以控制項為目標時介面，呼叫方法來處理事件，事件引數傳遞做為參數和方法會傳回回呼的結果。When a callback event targets a control that implements the interface, the method is called to handle the event, passing the event argument as a parameter and the method returns the result of the callback. 擷取資料的原始檔控制中的資料，在回呼期間的控制項可以進行同步或非同步。Controls that retrieve data from a data source control during callback can do so synchronously or asynchronously. ASP.NET 控制項喜歡， ，和以同步方式實作。ASP.NET controls like , , and are implemented synchronously. 同步回呼不會防止使用者在瀏覽器中使用。Synchronous callbacks do not prevent the user from working in the browser. 在同步模式中，可以執行一次只能有一個回呼，具有優先順序的最後一個回呼。In synchronous mode, only one callback at a time can execute, with the last callback taking precedence. 支援非同步行為實作 Web 控制項時，同時可能會引發多個回呼。When a Web control is implemented to support asynchronous behavior, multiple callbacks can be raised simultaneously. 如需非同步程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件架構非同步模式 (EAP)](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-eap.md)。For details on asynchronous programming, see [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern (EAP)](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-eap.md). 您可以指定來自使用者介面的回撥事件是否要呈現控制項實作介面會進行驗證。You can specify whether callback events originating from the user interface rendered by a control implementing the interface are validated. 事件的驗證是安全性的理想做法。Validation of events is a good security practice. 不過，基於效能考量您可以停用它。However, for performance reasons you can disable it. 若要控制是否事件上會執行驗證回呼事件，請將`enableEventValidation`屬性[@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指示詞或`enableEventValidation`屬性[頁面項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4123bb66-3fe4-4d62-b70e-33758656b458) Web.config 檔案。To control whether event validation is performed on callback events, set the `enableEventValidation` attribute of the [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive or the `enableEventValidation` attribute of the [pages Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4123bb66-3fe4-4d62-b70e-33758656b458) of the Web.config file. 如果您設定在程式碼中的屬性中設定`Page_Init`網頁處理的階段。If you set the property in code, set it in the `Page_Init` phase of page processing. 如需有關如何平衡事件驗證其效能成本與安全性優點的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 效能概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b)。For more information on balancing the security benefit of event validation with its performance cost, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetCallbackResult() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回以控制項為目標之回呼事件的結果。

span.span: Returns the results of a callback event that targets a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擲回例外狀況也不會阻止從被呼叫，並傳回結果。Exceptions thrown in will not prevent from being called and returning a result. 若要避免從傳回的結果，設定擲回例外狀況時的旗標並傳回空字串從。To prevent from returning a result, set a flag when an exception is thrown in and return an empty string from .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaiseCallbackEvent(string eventArgument) cil managed

param.name: eventArgument
param.span: 表示傳遞至事件處理常式之事件引數的字串。

span.span: A string that represents an event argument to pass to the event handler.

summary.span: 處理以控制項為目標的回呼事件。

span.span: Processes a callback event that targets a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`null`用做為事件引數參數，字串會序列化為"null"，傳送回到伺服器。When `null` is used as the event argument parameter, the string is serialized to "null" and sent back to the server. 因為沒有任何方法可以區分`null`和"null"，您應該避免使用`null`以回撥的引數參數。Because there is no way to distinguish between `null` and "null", you should avoid using `null` argument parameters with callbacks. 擲回例外狀況也不會阻止從被呼叫，並傳回結果。Exceptions thrown in will not prevent from being called and returning a result. 若要避免從傳回的結果，設定擲回例外狀況時的旗標並傳回空字串從。To prevent from returning a result, set a flag when an exception is thrown in and return an empty string from .
